location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Owen Tudor Burne, India Office to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter, written on thick black edged mourning paper, regarding his recent illness and their having missed each other in Bournemouth as Pelly had already left.The letter also informs Pelly that he will not be discussing Cabul [Kabul] affairs as it is all in The Timeswhich has been obtaining good information on the matter.
